metadata.title: BDA Dashboard - Comprehensive Data Sources
metadata.description: Complete list of data sources, citations, and references for all dashboard data

sources.title: Census of India 2011
sources.coverage: Historical population data, demographics, literacy rates, sex ratio, age distribution

sources.title: Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) Migration Report 2020-21
sources.organization: Ministry of Statistics & Programme Implementation, GoI
sources.coverage: National and urban migration patterns, reasons for migration, employment statistics

sources.title: PLFS Annual Report 2023-24
sources.coverage: Labour force participation rate, unemployment rate, employment indicators

sources.title: BDA Approved Layouts List (1972-2025)
sources.coverage: Complete list of 1,017 approved layouts with details on location, extent, approval date, use type

sources.title: BDA Layouts - Spatial Data (KML)
sources.coverage: Geospatial boundaries for 149 BDA layouts with polygon coordinates, layout numbers, areas in acres

sources.title: Revised Master Plan 2015 (RMP 2015)
sources.coverage: Land use planning, zoning regulations, development control rules for Bengaluru Metropolitan Area

sources.title: Draft Revised Master Plan 2031 (RMP 2031)
sources.coverage: Proposed land use planning, population projections to 2031, infrastructure planning
sources.note: Withdrawn in 2020 to integrate TOD Policy

sources.title: RMP 2015 Planning Districts Index Map
sources.coverage: 47 planning districts with three-ring classification system (Ring I: Core 101-107, Ring II: Intermediate 201-218, Ring III: Peripheral 301-322) covering 1,306 km²

sources.title: RMP 2031 Planning Districts Index Map (Draft)
sources.coverage: 42 planning districts with sequential numbering (1-42) and zone-based naming system covering 1,306 km²
sources.note: Draft - Withdrawn in 2020 to integrate TOD Policy

sources.title: Bangalore Development Authority Act, 1976 (Karnataka Act 12 of 1976)
sources.organization: India Code, Ministry of Law & Justice
sources.coverage: Statutory functions, powers, duties of BDA across planning, development, land acquisition, finance

sources.title: Bangalore Development Authority Act, 1976 (IndianKanoon)
sources.coverage: Complete Act text with sections on development schemes, land acquisition, betterment tax, building regulations

sources.title: Karnataka Town and Country Planning Act, 1961
sources.coverage: Planning authority functions, comprehensive development plans, zoning regulations

sources.title: Greater Bengaluru Governance Act, 2024 (Act 36 of 2025)
sources.coverage: Formation of Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA), reduction of BDA jurisdiction from 1,294 km² to 582 km²

sources.title: EAC-PM Report on Domestic Migration (400 Million Dreams)
sources.organization: Economic Advisory Council to the Prime Minister
sources.coverage: Internal migration trends, decline from 37.64% (2011) to 28.88% (2023), urban migration patterns

sources.title: Karnataka Budget Analysis 2024-25
sources.coverage: State budget allocations, infrastructure spending, urban development funds

sources.title: CBRE Global Tech Talent Guidebook 2025
sources.coverage: 1M+ tech workforce milestone, 12% tech employment growth (2018-2023), working-age population 75.5%

sources.title: ILO India Employment Report 2024 - Youth Employment, Education and Skills
sources.coverage: Youth employment trends, education migration, skills development, employment opportunities

sources.title: Bengaluru Urban Infrastructure Report 2020
sources.coverage: Infrastructure assessment, development challenges, urban growth analysis

sources.title: Migration Along Bengaluru's Rural–Urban Continuum: Implications for Household Well-being and Climate Change Adaptation
sources.coverage: Bengaluru-specific migration patterns, employment sectors, rural-urban migration, household impacts

sources.title: Analysis of Socio-Economic Conditions and Migration Patterns of Migrant Settlements in Bengaluru
sources.coverage: Migrant socio-economic conditions, settlement patterns, employment types

sources.title: Is it Push or Pull? Recent Evidence from Migration into Bangalore, India
sources.coverage: Push vs pull factors in Bengaluru migration, employment opportunities, wage differentials

sources.title: Evaluation Study of Migration of Labour to and from Karnataka
sources.coverage: Labour migration patterns, interstate migration, employment sectors, working conditions

sources.title: BPAC - Rapid Population Growth in Bangalore: Causes and Solutions
sources.coverage: 42% migrant population statistic, population growth drivers, urban challenges

sources.title: How India Moves: Understanding Patterns of Migration Within the Country
sources.coverage: National internal migration patterns, urban destination cities, migration corridors

sources.title: BDA Environmental Database - Water Bodies
sources.coverage: 87 lakes, 4 major rivers (Arkavathi, Vrishabhavathi, Pinakini, Dakshina Pinakini), 1 reservoir (Thippagondanahalli)

sources.title: Bannerghatta National Park Eco-Sensitive Zone Notification
sources.organization: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
sources.coverage: 25 km² eco-sensitive zone, 10km buffer zone regulations, conservation measures

sources.title: Heritage Gardens - Lalbagh & Cubbon Park
sources.coverage: Lalbagh (96 hectares), Cubbon Park (121 hectares) - heritage garden designations

sources.title: OpenCity Bengaluru - BDA Datasets
sources.coverage: 23+ BDA datasets including layouts (KML), CA sites, land use maps, master plan documents, cadastral maps

sources.title: Bangalore Development Authority - Wikipedia
sources.coverage: BDA history, organizational structure, jurisdiction changes, key statistics

sources.title: Greater Bengaluru Authority - Wikipedia
sources.coverage: GBA formation, jurisdiction transfer, governance structure

data_quality_notes.population_projections: 2031 population projection of 20M is from RMP 2031 draft (withdrawn 2020). Actual projection may vary with new Master Plan 2041.
data_quality_notes.migration_2024_25: Migration patterns for 2024-25 are projections based on PLFS 2020-21 urban migration data (47.5% marriage in urban areas), adjusted for Bengaluru's IT/education hub characteristics with 1M+ tech workforce and 3.7M students in Karnataka.
data_quality_notes.layouts_data: Sample of 9 layouts from total 1,017. Complete dataset extraction in progress.
data_quality_notes.jurisdiction_change: BDA jurisdiction reduced from 1,294 km² to 582 km² in 2025 with GBA formation. Data reflects post-reduction jurisdiction unless otherwise noted.

methodology_notes.migration_projection: 2024-25 Bengaluru migration patterns projected from: (1) PLFS 2020-21 urban migration baseline (47.5% marriage, 22% employment), (2) Bengaluru IT sector growth (1M+ tech workers, 12% growth 2018-2023, CBRE 2025), (3) Education hub status (3.7M students in Karnataka, ILO 2024), (4) Research on Bengaluru-specific migration (Rahman et al. 2024). Final projection: Work 52%, Education 18%, Marriage 15%, Family 11%, Other 4%.
methodology_notes.population_growth: Historical data from Census of India (1971-2011). Projections from RMP 2031 draft. CAGR calculated based on census data.
methodology_notes.tech_workforce: 1M+ tech workforce from CBRE Global Tech Talent Guidebook 2025. Growth rate (12% 2018-2023) from same source.
methodology_notes.migrant_percentage: 42% migrant population from BPAC 2024 study, consistent with Census 2011 finding of 42% population from outside district/state.
